description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Beef & Potato Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chargrilled Beef & Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine beef, potato, salad mix, onion, capers, cucumber and peas in a bowl. Season. Toss gently to combine. To serve, spoon over sour cream mixture.
